snippet: An increase in deaths at Aqueduct Racetrack this year prompted the state oversight board to impose new prescription limits and disclosure requirements.
abstract: Increase in deaths at Aqueduct Racetrack prompts New York State Racing and Wagering Board to impose new prescription limits and disclosure requirements for horses; new, aggressive rules come as racing wrestles with drug culture that many of its most experienced officials contend is diminishing the sport.
lead_paragraph: An increase in deaths at Aqueduct Racetrack this year prompted the state oversight board to impose new prescription limits and disclosure requirements.

headline.seo: New York State Tightens Drug Rules for Racehorses
headline.main: New York State Tightens Drug Rules for Racehorses
headline.print_headline: State Tightens Drug Rules for Horses

keywords.value: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
